mapper.select: SELECT r.review_id AS reviewId, r.accommodations_id AS accommodationsId, r.user_id AS userId, r.author_name AS authorName, r.rating, r.content, r.created_at AS createdAt, a.accommodations_name AS accommodationName, rr.content AS replyContent, COALESCE(rr.updated_at, rr.created_at) AS replyUpdatedAt FROM review r LEFT JOIN accommodation a ON r.accommodations_id = a.accommodations_id LEFT JOIN review_replies rr ON rr.review_id = r.review_id WHERE r.accommodations_id = #{accommodationsId} AND r.is_deleted = 0 ORDER BY r.created_at DESC

SELECT r.review_id AS reviewId, r.accommodations_id AS accommodationsId, r.user_id AS userId, r.author_name AS authorName, r.rating, r.content, r.visit_date AS visitDate, r.created_at AS createdAt, a.accommodations_name AS accommodationName, (SELECT image_url FROM accommodation_image ai WHERE ai.accommodations_id = r.accommodations_id ORDER BY ai.sort_order LIMIT 1) AS accommodationImage, (SELECT checkin FROM reservation res WHERE res.user_id = r.user_id AND res.accommodations_id = r.accommodations_id AND res.reservation_status = 2 AND res.checkout <= r.created_at ORDER BY res.checkout DESC LIMIT 1) AS checkin, (SELECT checkout FROM reservation res WHERE res.user_id = r.user_id AND res.accommodations_id = r.accommodations_id AND res.reservation_status = 2 AND res.checkout <= r.created_at ORDER BY res.checkout DESC LIMIT 1) AS checkout FROM review r JOIN accommodation a ON r.accommodations_id = a.accommodations_id WHERE r.user_id = #{userId} AND r.is_deleted = 0 ORDER BY r.created_at DESC
SELECT review_image_id AS reviewImageId, review_image_url AS imageUrl, sort_order AS sortOrder FROM review_image WHERE review_id = #{reviewId} ORDER BY sort_order, review_image_id

SELECT rt.review_tag_id AS reviewTagId, rt.review_tag_name AS reviewTagName FROM review_tag_map rtm JOIN review_tag rt ON rtm.review_tag_id = rt.review_tag_id WHERE rtm.review_id = #{reviewId} AND rt.is_active = 1 ORDER BY rt.review_tag_id
SELECT review_tag_id AS reviewTagId, review_tag_name AS reviewTagName FROM review_tag WHERE is_active = 1 ORDER BY review_tag_id

SELECT rt.review_tag_name FROM review_tag_map rtm JOIN review_tag rt ON rtm.review_tag_id = rt.review_tag_id JOIN review r ON rtm.review_id = r.review_id WHERE r.accommodations_id = #{accommodationId} AND r.is_deleted = 0 GROUP BY rt.review_tag_id, rt.review_tag_name ORDER BY COUNT(rtm.review_tag_id) DESC LIMIT 3
